home.name: Danny Cabrera
home.intro: Front-End Developer specialized in Angular, Tailwind, and Flowbite
home.subtitle: I turn ideas into modern, fast, and scalable applications.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am Danny Rubén Cabrera Aguilar, a Software Engineer and Junior Front-End Developer with one year of experience creating modern and intuitive web solutions.
about.projects: I have worked on projects such as epic-test.app and surviz.net, developing applications like Clima Laboral and Fit Cultural, where my focus has been on providing tools that allow visualizing results and making relevant decisions within organizations.
about.experience: My experience combines Angular, Tailwind, Flowbite, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and Chart.js, along with AWS services such as Amplify, Cognito, S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and API Gateway.
about.passion: I am passionate about learning, continuously improving, and creating high-impact products, working in a team and aligning goals to achieve efficient and effective solutions.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: Throughout my experience as a Front-End Developer, I have acquired and consolidated skills that allow me to create modern, efficient, and scalable applications.

frontend.title: Frontend
items: Angular – Building dynamic and robust web applications
Tailwind CSS & Flowbite – Fast, modern, and responsive interfaces
JavaScript / TypeScript – Developing complex logic and functionalities
HTML & CSS – Structuring and styling intuitive interfaces

cloud.title: Cloud / Lightweight Backend
items: AWS Amplify – Deploying and managing cloud applications
Cognito – User authentication and management
S3 – Secure and scalable file storage
DynamoDB – Efficient and fast NoSQL databases
Lambda & API Gateway – Creating secure microservices and endpoints

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk! You can write to me or find me on my professional networks:
contact.message: I am always open to new projects, collaborations, and learning opportunities.
